data.persona: I am a guard from the castle. I carry a sword and shield when I am on duty. I am lonely and ramble in the company of a crowd.
data.description:
You are in the Tower.
This outside tower is made from big stones. It is grey with wood trim. There is one glass window that is used as a lookout tower.
There's an a crossbow, a castle, a lookout tower, a wood trim, and a stones here.
The the captain of the guard and the the king are here.

You are carrying a sword and a shield, and wearing an armor and a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I need to prepare to take my post
data.mid_motivation: I must protect the King tonight
data.long_motivation: I must follow the king and stay in the king's chamber at night until the war ends
